00029 
00030 import gettext
00031 from Koo.Common import Common
00032 
00033 from Koo import Rpc
00034 
00035 from Koo.Screen import Screen
00036 from Koo.Model.Group import RecordGroup
00037 
00038 
00039 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00040 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00041 from PyQt4.uic import *
00042 
00043 (SearchDialogUi, SearchDialogBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('win_search.ui') )
00044 
00045 class SearchDialog( QDialog, SearchDialogUi ):
00046         def __init__(self, model, sel_multi=True, ids=[], context={}, domain = [], parent = None):
00047                 QDialog.__init__( self, parent )
00048                 SearchDialogUi.__init__( self )
00049                 self.setupUi( self )
00050 
00051                 self.setModal( True )
00052 
00053                 self.result=None
00054                 self.context = context
00055                 self.context.update(Rpc.session.context)
00056                 self.allowMultipleSelection = sel_multi
00057 
00058                 self.modelGroup = RecordGroup( model )
00059                 self.modelGroup.setDomain( domain )
00060 
00061                 self.screen.setRecordGroup( self.modelGroup )
00062                 self.screen.setViewTypes( ['tree'] )
00063 
00064                 self.view = self.screen.currentView()
00065                 self.view.setAllowMultipleSelection( sel_multi )
00066                 self.view.setReadOnly( True )
00067                 self.connect( self.view, SIGNAL('activated()'), self.accepted )
00068 
00069                 self.model_name = model
00070 
00071                 view_form = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', self.model_name, 'fields_view_get', False, 'form', self.context)
00072                 self.form.setup( view_form['arch'], view_form['fields'], model )
00073                 self.form.hideButtons()
00074                 self.connect( self.form, SIGNAL('keyDownPressed()'), self.setFocusToList )
00075 
00076                 self.title = _('Search: %s') % self.form.name
00077                 self.title_results = _('Search: %s (%%d result(s))') % self.form.name
00078 
00079                 self.setWindowTitle( self.title )
00080 
00081                 self.ids = ids
00082                 if self.ids:
00083                         self.modelGroup.setFilter( [('id','in',ids)] )
00084                         self.reload()
00085                         model = self.view.widget.model()
00086 
00087                 # TODO: Use Designer Widget Promotion instead
00088                 layout = self.layout()
00089                 layout.insertWidget(0, self.screen )
00090                 layout.insertWidget(0, self.form )
00091 
00092                 self.form.setFocus()
00093 
00094                 self.connect( self.pushAccept, SIGNAL( "clicked()"), self.accepted )
00095                 self.connect( self.pushCancel , SIGNAL( "clicked()"), self.reject )
00096                 self.connect( self.pushFind, SIGNAL( "clicked()"), self.find )
00097                 self.connect( self.form, SIGNAL( "search()" ), self.find )
00098 
00099         def setFocusToList(self):
00100                 self.screen.setFocus()
00101 
00102         def find(self):
00103                 self.modelGroup.setFilter( self.form.value() )
00104                 self.reload()
00105 
00106         def reload(self):
00107                 self.modelGroup.update()
00108                 if self.allowMultipleSelection:
00109                         self.view.selectAll()
00110                 else:
00111                         self.view.selectFirst()
00112                 self.setWindowTitle( self.title_results % self.modelGroup.count() )
00113 
00114         def accepted( self ):
00115                 self.result = self.screen.selectedIds() or self.ids
00116                 self.accept()
00117
